Vivian & Jeremy's super awesome blog post

This is the blog post for CSC_5IG01_TP-HCI for mixed reality.

/!\ This Blog is a work in progress

Welcome to our blog where you will find a lot of IP-Paris flavor !

Everything here is handcrafted by IP-Paris students. Join us as we share and document our journey throughout this class.

Lecture Homework 1: Locomotion Presentation. Presents 3 ideas for locomotion techniques in VR.

Lecture Homework 2: Final Project: Locomotion Ideation Prensentation. Present the locomotion technique we will use in our final project.

Lecture Homework 3: Final Project: Evaluating the locomotion technique. The evaluation results of our implementation technique.

Lecture Homework 4: Final Project: Final Presentation. Presenting the project as a whole.

This blog post Lab 1 explains how we set up the blog.

In Lab 2, focuses on configuring Unity and creating a simple coin-collection mini-game.

Lab 3 is another collection game. This time using a Unity tutorial that features NavMeshes.

Lab 4 goes over how we setup Unity and the VR headset to work in unisson to create a simple VR game.

Lab 5 technical implementation of our locomotion technique.

this project by Jeremy-afk can be found on GitHub
